definition: piece of leather forming the front part of the upper of a shoe, provide (a shoe) with a new vamp
details:
noun
- piece of leather forming the front part of the upper of a shoe
- an improvised musical accompaniment
- a seductive woman who uses her sex appeal to exploit men
= synonyms: tease
verb
- provide (a shoe) with a new vamp
= example: provide (a shoe) with a new vamp
= synonyms: revamp
- act seductively with (someone)
- piece (something old) with a new part
= example: piece (something old) with a new part
= synonyms: vamp up
- make up
= example: make up
= synonyms: coin, vamp up
